entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023
